forgot_password_description: Don't worry! Enter your email and we'll send you an OTP to reset your password.
no_posts_yet: You don't have any posts yet!
create_posts_in_training: You can make them in the training screen.
compete_description: Compete with other users and track your progress
safety_action_1: Remove all ammo and magazine from firearm.
safety_action_2: Confirm firearm chamber is safely empty.
safety_action_3: Move all ammo to a secure area, away from the Strikeman practice area.
safety_action_4: Move all additional firearms to a secure area, away from the Strikeman practice area.
read_and_understood: I have read and understood the above
create_account_to_save_data: Create an account to save your data
logout_confirmation: Are you sure you want to logout?
convert_guest_description: Create an account to save your training data and access all features
getting_started_content: Welcome to Bulls Eye Dry Fire! Start by creating a training session in the Train tab.
training_guide_content: Learn how to use the training features and track your progress effectively.
faq_content: Find answers to common questions about using the app.
contact_support_content: Need help? Contact our support team at support@bullseyedryfire.com
information_we_collect_content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, use our services, or contact us for support.
how_we_use_information_content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, and communicate with you.
data_security_content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
your_rights_content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time through your account settings.
language_change_note: Changing the language will update the app interface immediately.
subscription_plans_content: We offer monthly and yearly subscription plans. All subscriptions auto-renew unless cancelled.
billing_content: Subscriptions are billed in advance on a monthly or yearly basis. Payment is processed through secure payment gateways.
cancellation_content: You can cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings. Cancellation takes effect at the end of the current billing period.
refund_policy_content: Refunds are available within 7 days of purchase. Contact support for refund requests.
subscription_active_description: Your subscription is active and you have access to all Pro features.
upgrade_to_pro_description: Upgrade to Pro to unlock all features and save your training data.
step_1_description: Set up your profile with your information to get started.
step_2_description: Navigate to the Train tab and create your first training session.
step_3_description: View your metrics and track your improvement over time in the Metrics tab.
step_4_description: Adjust app settings, language, and preferences in the Profile tab.
